long_description:
The trigger voltage is the level at which an oscilloscope will find the
start of a signal.

Requires a CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible Tektronix scopes (untested):
MDO4xxx, MSO4xxx, and DPO4xxx.
short_description: The TRIGGER_LEVEL_MDO3XXX node sets the trigger voltage (or queries it).

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node).

parameters.name: trigger_volts
parameters.description: The voltage to set the triggering level to.

parameters.name: query_set
parameters.description: Whether to query or set the triggering voltage.
